channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Ultimate FAQ – WordPress FAQ and Accordion Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Ultimate FAQ – WordPress FAQ and Accordion Plugin

item.title: CVE-2021-24968|2024-08-03T19:49:14.382Z -- unknown -- ultimate%20faq%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20faq%20and%20accordion%20plugin
item.description: The Ultimate FAQ WordPress plugin before 2.1.2 does not have capability and CSRF checks in the ewd_ufaq_welcome_add_faq and ewd_ufaq_welcome_add_faq_page AJAX actions, available to any authenticated users. As a result, any users, with a role as low as Subscriber could create FAQ and FAQ questions
